original_text:
All his laws are before me;
    I have not turned away from his decrees.
korean_text: 그의 모든 규례가 내 앞에 있고 내게서 그의 율례를 버리지 아니하였음이로다

sentences.original_text: All his laws are before me
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 모든 법이 내 앞에 있으며

sentences.original_text: I have not turned away from his decrees
